channel.title: Problem I keep meeting
channel.description: I downloaded the new Moparscape and after about 10 minutes of play it just says connection lost -attempting to reestablish, but it never does and then if i reopen the window whenever i log in i cant move and connection is lost instantly again. The only way i can get this to stop is to download Moparscape again but it only allows me like 10 mins online, my firewall is off etc so i havent got a clue why it keeps doin this to me any1 help?

item.title: Problem I keep meeting
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

thats got nothing to do with the client just a crappy server

Read full topic

item.description:

could well be i found out another thing, when this happens my whole inventory gets wiped out which sucks
